text: Shoshone County is a county in the U.S. state of Idaho. As of the 2020 census, 13,169 people lived there. The county seat is Wallace, and largest city is Kellogg. The county was founded in 1864 and named for the Native American Shoshone tribe. == Communities == === Cities === * Kellogg * Mullan * Osburn * Pinehurst * Smelterville * Wallace * Wardner === Unincorporated communities === * Adair * Avery * Big Creek * Calder * Cataldo * Clarkia * Enaville * Gold Creek * Kingston * Murray * Pine Creek * Prichard * Silverton === Ghost town === * Burke == References == Category:1864 establishments in Idaho Territory Category:Idaho counties
title: Shoshone County, Idaho
